sentence.Network_en: The sayings of Confucius offer guidance on this matter.
sentence.Network_cn: 孔子的教诲为此事提供了指引。

sentence.Network_en: A hundred years after Confucius died, Mencius taught and expanded Confucian doctrine.
sentence.Network_cn: 孔子去世100年后, 孟子传授并阐发了孔子的学说.

sentence.Network_en: Confucius was one of the wisest teachers of all times.
sentence.Network_cn: 孔子是有史以来最为博学的教师之一.
